reviews.text: We made a online booking for 2 rooms and got charged with PHP 1'000 in advance for the reservation. The room had to be payed at check-in what didn't bother me too much but the Reservation fee which I expected would be deducted from the room rate was very annoying. So full room rate plus the Reservation fee is definite a rip off.

reviews.text: Microtel was awesome...the room was clean, impressive specially with a bay view room. It was so relaxing to stay in this hotel. Definitely I will recommend this to all balikbayan who would like to enjoy the scenery of manila bay and at the same time enjoy the Mall of Asia. The location was great and the room was beautiful and spacious. But one thing I don't enjoy was the breakfast because the food was not that delicious as I expected. But overall rating with this hotel is awesome. I'll surely be visiting this hotel again but hoping for a better breakfast next time.
reviews.title: Value for money on the breakfast buffet

reviews.text: Don't expect five star luxury, but the hotel should be ranked more than average. Convenient location, close to the Mall of Asia (10 minutes walk or use a shuttle), a church (5 minutes walk) and to the SMX Convention Centre (7 minutes walk) make it unbeatable for short stays, especially if related to convention, conference or exhibition in SMX complex. Rooms are basic but clean, restrooms with toilet amenities. Complimentary drinking water (bottled) is provided within the room or in the corridors (from chilled dispensers). The restaurant and the lobby are not spacious so every evening it is re-shaped for breakfast purposes. Breakfast offers a choice of local flavours, there are also bread, milk and fruit stations. Don't miss the fantastic view of the Manila Bay and the sunset - best viewed from the roof and pool's level.
reviews.title: Just paying for the location

reviews.text: We stayed here on our last 2 nights upon returning from Boracay and heading back home. The hotel itself was pretty nice, clean rooms with great views of the bay. You are literally like a 5 minute walk away from the Mall of Asia but the hotel offers shuttles anyway. The breakfast was simple but good and I felt extremely safe there. I'd recommend staying here to anyone.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with a great location.

reviews.text: Recently we visited Manila on the way to the UK and required a hotel close to the Airport and close enough to shopping in order to pass the time until departure.
reviews.title: Convenient for Airport and last minute shopping.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is new, bright, and clean with attentive, friendly and very helpful staff. It also has a lovely restaurant and roof top pool. Also provided is a free shuttle service to the nearby Mall of Asia. The reason we chose this particular hotel was I had previously stayed in its namesake in Davao. Breakfast is very good buffet style with a large selection to suit everyone. If you have an evening flight as we did the hotel will take care of your luggage to allow you freedom to visit the nearby shops without worrying about its safety?
reviews.title: A quick city break for two

reviews.text: I had just arrived from London to spend the weekend in Manila with my Fiancee before heading off down to Laguna where we were to start our new life together.
reviews.title: Great View of the bay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Microtel is not too far from the main airport serving Luzon (Ninoy Aquino International) although Manila traffic can make a journey of even the shortest distance take an age. The hotel itself is near to the SM Mall of Asia, which is purported to be the largest of its type in Asia and has all the amenities one could ask for in the way of shops and restaurants, an ice rink and also a multiplex cinema.
reviews.title: Good for short stays

aka: Microtel Manila Mall Of Asia Hotel
description: This economy class hotel is convenient to a myriad of popular tourist sites in Manila. The hotel offers 150 clean and comfortable rooms that are adorned with modern amenities such as chiropractic approved mattresses, color television and cable channels, window seating for relaxation, built-in desk and furniture and wireless Internet access. Guests will also find a restaurant and outdoor pool which offer a perfect place to relax after a long day of exploration. The Microtel Hotels & Resorts Mall of Asia is the perfect property for guests that want quaint accommodation in a prime location with signature Microtel quality.
